general.no_perm_admin: I don't have permission to do that
general.commands_available:
Hey There! My name is Alita.
I'm here to help you manage your groups!
Commands available:
 Ã— /start: Start the bot
 Ã— /help: Give's you this message.
 Ã— /donate: Information related about how to donate!

All commands can either be used with / or !.

Some error occured, report to {SUPPORT_GROUP}

Error: {ef}
general.no_admin_cmd_perm: You cannot use an admin command!

adminlist.reloaded_admins: Reloaded all admins in this chat!

admin.user_admin_invalid: Cannot act on this user, maybe I wasn't the one who changed their permissions.

admin.bot_no_mute_right: I don't have enough rights to mute this user.
admin.bot_no_unmute_right: I don't have enough rights to unmute this user.
admin.bot_no_kick_right: I don't have enough rights to kick this user.
admin.bot_no_ban_right: I don't have enough rights to ban this user.
admin.bot_no_unban_right: I don't have enough rights to unban this user.
admin.not_admin: I'm not admin or I don't have rights.
admin.no_promote_demote_perm: You don't have permission to promote or demote members!
admin.no_restrict_perm: You don't have permissions to restrict members!
admin.no_invite_perm: I don't have permission for invite link!
admin.no_user_invite_perm: You don't have permissions to invite users.
